products.name: Safiyah 77'' Corduroy Sofa
products.description: Design your home in style using this lifestyle upholstered sofa. Featuring a classic modern look, this sofa is great for creating an appearance that is relaxing and inviting.

products.name: Shonn 120.08'' Pillow Top Arm Modular Sofa
products.description: This FCH 305*141*85 chenille 3-seater with footstool double bag indoor modular sofa can provide ample seating when guests are over, perfect for a small space and easy to lay down on for a nap.

products.name: Brittany 81.5'' Vegan Leather Convertible Sofa
products.description: With its ribbed cushioned back, this sofa gives your body all the support you need to sit and relax for hours. The combination of curved armrests and slanted legs work together to provide a unique rounded look that stands out.

products.name: Edmundo 75'' Square Arm Sofa
products.description: This sofa's understated design makes it a versatile choice for a variety of styles. Easy assembly and no additional tool required.

products.name: Engelhardt 51.96'' Faux Leather Sofa
products.description: Accent any room in your house with the button tufting with its signature diamond button creating a soft, relaxed style look.

products.name: Hana 52.40'' Upholstered Loveseat
products.description: This collection features a timeless modern design in a beautiful beige fabric to fit any room with the versatility you want.

products.name: Ellensburg 76'' Square Arm Sleeper Convertible Sofa
products.description: This Ellensburg 76'' Square Arm Sleeper brings effortless mid-century-inspired style to your space and instantly turns your living room into a guest room. You can push the two separate back cushions partially or down, to create an ideal spot for a nap or a twin bed.

products.name: Bradlie Solid Wood Platform Storage Bed
products.description: Introducing a timeless and traditional pine bed frame featuring a captivating horizontal slatted and hollow headboard design. This modern classic exudes an everlasting appeal that never goes out of style.

products.name: Morrisa Metal Bed
products.description: Experience the luxurious metal platform bed with a beautifully curved metal headboard. Its sleek and modern design adds elegance and sophistication to your space.

products.name: Karo Upholstered Metal Wingback Storage Bed
products.description: The bed frame is the most practical item in the bedroom. Our upholstered bed not only allows for storage but also comes with a charging station and RBG LED light to meet your various needs.

products.name: Tufted Upholstered Low Profile Platform Bed
products.description: Exquisite button tufted headboard with a wingback design can match a variety of bedroom styles. The fabric material has strong breathability and is skin-friendly.

products.name: Kingery Standard Bed
products.description: Give your bedroom or guest room an instant upgrade with this classic low profile bed. Slats and center legs are included for added stability.

products.name: Aristia Bed
products.description: This Wood Platform Bed Frame is beautifully simple and works well with any style of home decor. The frame and legs are made of wood to support your memory foam, latex, or spring mattress.

products.name: Whetzel 42'' Desk
products.description: This clean-lined writing desk is an ideal workspace in your home office. It's built from solid and engineered wood, and it rests on an X-frame with a trestle base for a modern look.

products.name: Whiddon 60'' Desk
products.description: This writing desk pairs a minimal silhouette with a mixed-material look for the right industrial design in your home office. Four open shelves give you room for books, equipment, and office supplies, so your desktop stays uncluttered.

products.name: Proulx 59'' Desk
products.description: This sleek rectangular writing table delivers a place to work without a fuss. Your new work surface has a distressed finish in medium brown, and sits on a black trestle base made from engineered wood.

products.name: Cylan Height Adjustable Desk With Double-layer
products.description: The double-layer electric standing desk boasts a unique design that maximizes your workspace and gives you ample room to store your items. Made from high-quality particleboard, this desk is incredibly strong and durable, supporting weights of up to 176 pounds.

products.name: Ramapo 62.99'' Desk
products.description: A simple but well-designed desk can make your daily work more creative. The large desktop easily accommodates two monitors, even a printer, and other working equipment.

products.name: Angeleen Ghost Chair with Gold Metal Base - Hospitality Seating - Accent and Side Chair
products.description: Rejuvenate your home with modern seating that will be a lovely addition as an accent chair in your living room, den, library, or sitting room.

products.name: Euclid Upholstered Accent Chair with Metal Legs
products.description: Add this side chair to your living room ensemble and give it some contemporary glam appeal. It's crafted from solid and engineered wood and wrapped in foam-filled velvet upholstery for a luxe look.

products.name: Giove Faux Leather Barrel Chair
products.description: This popular design would make every single person fall in love which adds a pop of pattern and inviting style to any space in your home with this chair.

products.name: Percy Faux Leather Wingback Chair
products.description: This accent chair brings a rustic touch to your bedroom, living room, or reading nook. It's made of engineered wood with an espresso finish and faux leather upholstery.

products.name: 25.6'' W Linen Blend Armchair
products.description: This modern chair can provide ample seating when guests are over, perfect for a small space. The cushions you sit on are nice and firm.

products.name: Pettit Faux Leather Recliner
products.description: DS Primary Product Style: Traditional, fully Reclined Depth - Front to Back: 62.6 Inches.

products.name: Cardali Bookcase
products.description: Give your living room look or bedroom a spot to stage your favorite novels, artful accents, or framed family photos with this versatile bookcase.

products.name: Ciqala Ladder Bookcase
products.description: This 4-tier ladder shelf is designed in a modern industrial style. The minimalist tiered storage style adds satisfaction and convenience to life. The industrial design adopts a metal frame structure.

products.name: Amiogho Bookcase
products.description: Tree bookshelf, bookcase, bamboo book rack, storage shelves in the living room, free-standing books holder organizer, space saver for home, office, kid's room black.

products.name: Oreilly 62.2''H x 23.6''W Wood Etagere Bookcase
products.description: This etagere bookcase completes your living room or bedroom with a modern look and plenty of storage space. Its frame is crafted from metal in a smooth black hue and an openwork, industrial style.

products.name: Doyno Bookcase
products.description: The Bush Furniture universal small 2-shelf bookcase provides a versatile organization solution that makes it easy to show off your library or brighten up the room with pictures and decorations.
